features.featureTitle: Create ResumeBuilderPage component at /resume-builder route displaying 14 resume templates organized in two categories: Indian Format (Fresher Resume, Government Job Resume, Private Job Resume, Hindi Resume, Biodata for Marriage, Teacher Resume, Police/Army Resume) and International Format (ATS Friendly Resume, US Resume, UK CV Format, Canada Resume, Europass CV, Creative Resume, Corporate Resume)

Implement multi-step form wizard with progressive sections including Personal Info (name, email, phone, address, LinkedIn, portfolio), Education (degree, institution, year, grade), Experience (company, role, duration, responsibilities), Skills (technical, soft skills), Projects, Certifications, Languages, Achievements, and References with ability to add/remove individual entries within each section

Create live preview component that renders resume in real-time as user fills form fields, updating instantly without page reload and displaying exactly how the final PDF will appear with proper formatting, spacing, and typography matching the selected template

Implement custom color theme selector with at least 6 predefined color palettes (Professional Blue, Corporate Black, Creative Purple, Modern Teal, Classic Gray, Elegant Maroon) that dynamically apply to resume headers, section borders, accent lines, and text highlights without affecting readability

Create auto-formatting logic that converts Skills section entries into bullet points, auto-formats dates to MM/YYYY format, formats phone numbers to Indian (+91) or International format based on selected template category, capitalizes proper nouns, and ensures consistent spacing throughout the resume

Add basic AI summary generator using local logic (no external API calls) that analyzes user's experience entries and skills to generate 2-3 sentence professional summary focusing on years of experience, key skills, notable achievements, and career objectives using action-oriented language and industry-standard phrasing

Create individual SEO-friendly pages for each of the 14 resume templates at routes /resume-builder/[template-slug] with unique meta titles following pattern '[Template Name] Resume Builder - Free Online Tool | Document Master Tools', descriptions highlighting template-specific benefits, Open Graph tags, FAQ sections answering common questions about each template format, and internal links to Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, and Image Tools

Ensure all Resume Builder components including main hub page, template selection, form wizard, live preview, and individual template pages are fully mobile responsive with vertical form layout on screens below 768px, collapsible sections on mobile, touch-friendly input controls, preview positioned below form on mobile, and proper scaling from 320px width upward

Style Resume Builder with modern clean UI matching existing Tailwind design system using card-based layout for form sections, smooth transitions for step navigation, progress indicator showing completion percentage, optional save draft functionality storing data in localStorage, clear primary call-to-action buttons (Next, Download PDF), and consistent spacing aligned with Calculator, PDF, and Image Tools styling

Integrate AdPlaceholder components into Resume Builder pages with top banner ad (728×90) after H1 heading, in-content ad (300×250) positioned between form wizard and preview sections on desktop, and sidebar ad (160×600) in right sidebar layout when viewport width exceeds 1024px, ensuring ads do not interfere with form functionality or preview visibility

Update App.tsx routing to include /resume-builder main route displaying ResumeBuilderPage and individual routes for all 14 resume templates following pattern /resume-builder/[template-slug] where slugs are: fresher-resume, government-job-resume, private-job-resume, hindi-resume, biodata-for-marriage, teacher-resume, police-army-resume, ats-friendly-resume, us-resume, uk-cv-format, canada-resume, europass-cv, creative-resume, corporate-resume
